act.description: Whether to enable the active mode.

actwt.description: In active mode: Wait this amount of seconds until sending the next update. The actual interval will be this time plus the time it takes to get a GPS fix.

mvres.description: (movement resolution) In passive mode: After detecting movement send an update and wait this amount of time until movement again can trigger the next update.

mvt.description: (movement timeout) In passive mode: Send update at least this often (in seconds).

gpst.description: GPS timeout (in seconds): Timeout for GPS fix.

celt.description: Cellular timeout (in seconds): Timeout for acquiring a cellular connection.

acct.description: Accelerometer threshold in m/sÂ²: Minimal absolute value for an accelerometer reading to be considered movement.
